title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Re;surrection
description: Since the demise of the man believed to be Britanniaâ€™s most wicked emperor one year ago, the world has enjoyed an unprecedented peace under the guidance of the United Federation of Nations. However, this fragile calm is shattered when armed militants successfully kidnap former princess Nunnally vi Britannia and Suzaku Kururugi, the chief advisor of the Black Knights, sparking an international crisis.The powerful and untrustworthy Kingdom of Zilkhstan is accused of orchestrating their capture.
